body:
Now I could reproduce.

I think we can fix this issues without need to revert the original commit and remove the feature that was added.

See my new test cases:

https://github.com/rafaelfranca/rails/commit/2cbf1133e10bdb56e1df0f630fcfc051a64cd6cc

The last one is generating `SELECT COUNT( line_items.* ) FROM line_items`.

We can fix this case easily changing this line:

```ruby
count_with = '*' if count_with.blank? || count_with =~ /,/
```

to something like this

```ruby
count_with = '*' if count_with.blank? || count_with =~ /,/ || count_with =~ /\.*/
```

You can use this commit https://github.com/rafaelfranca/rails/commit/0087f42a1e4f3ffa4c5c3fe8dbb94d69d8586a49 to add test coverage to your fix
